sys_element_mapping.value:
Hello Trigger➛Adopting User Record➛Name,

 

Your Meeting for adopting Trigger➛Adopting User Record➛Dog ID➛Name has been scheduled on Trigger➛Adopting User Record➛Choose Date/Time for meeting. 

Please be at your venue Trigger➛Adopting User Record➛Dog ID➛Adoption Center➛Name on time. 

 

Thanks

Pet Adoption
